left-block-main-screen.text: With 5 years of hands-on enduro experience, we‚Äôll help you unlock the power of the mountains and the freedom of true off-road riding.

advantages.title-1-block: Customized Adventures for Every Skill Level
advantages.title-3-block: We Focus on Comfort and Experience
advantages.description-1-block: Each ride is tailored to you ‚Äî from easy scenic trails to challenging pro-level routes.
advantages.description-2-block: Pricing includes full gear: helmet, boots, protective suit ‚Äî everything you need to ride safely.
advantages.description-3-block: Just bring a change of clothes. We‚Äôll take care of the rest: showers, parking, GoPro footage, coffee & snacks.

location.text: Our base is surrounded by six 2000m+ peaks. Reaching the foot of any of them takes just about 1.5 hours.

walk.title: CARPATHIAN NATURE WALK
walk.description: Relaxed ride through serene trails and meadows ‚Äî the ideal way to connect with nature and gain basic off-road skills.

panoramas.title: THRILLING PANORAMAS
panoramas.description: Ride through scenic ridgelines, stream crossings, and uphill trails with panoramic views and a dose of adrenaline.

brave.title: TRAIL OF THE BRAVE
points: Hidden Hutsul trails and guide-only paths
brave.description: Ready for a real challenge? Ride deep into the wild Carpathians with steep climbs, rocky paths, and wild beauty.

extreme.title: CARPATHIAN EXTREME RIDE
points: Routes only the toughest can conquer
extreme.description: üî• Heart-pounding adrenaline in the mountains üèîÔ∏è. Extreme climbs, sharp drops, wild streams, and no room for fear üí™

study.title: FIRST STEPS ON TWO WHEELS
points: Constant guidance from instructors (emotional support too üòÑ)
study.description: Our instructors believe in you even more than your mom üòÑ. We make your first ride fun, safe, and unforgettable üöÄ

pricing.table-text-row-4-1-span: (bike with gear + fuel, no guide included)
pricing.row-1-service-7: Guide support on foot to summit

comfort.title: We‚Äôve included these in the price for your best experience:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This website is owned and operated by Sole Proprietor Hrapeniuk L.M. We respect the privacy of our users and comply with the requirements of the Law of Ukraine 'On Personal Data Protection' as well as international standards (GDPR).
privacy.no-data: We do not collect, store, or process any personal information automatically. We do not use cookies, analytics services, or any other tools to track user activity.
privacy.contact-info: If you contact us via forms on the site, email, or other means of communication, the data you provide will be used solely to respond to your inquiry. This data is not shared with third parties and is retained only as long as necessary to process your request.
privacy.user-rights-title: Each user has the right to:

user-rights.know: - know what personal data is stored about them (if any);
user-rights.correct: - request correction or deletion of such data;
user-rights.withdraw: - withdraw their consent to data processing;
user-rights.complain: - lodge a complaint with the relevant supervisory authority.

privacy.update-info: We reserve the right to update this policy. The current version is always available on this page.
privacy.contact-us: If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us at:

instructors.instructor-title-1row: Our team has only higher-level, passionate pros

konan.name: Vasyl
konan.description: Enduro isn‚Äôt just a hobby for me ‚Äî it‚Äôs a way of life. I love exploring new trails and sharing my experience with others. During my training sessions, we don‚Äôt just focus on riding techniques ‚Äî we also enjoy the nature, overcome obstacles, and create unforgettable memories. I‚Äôm always there to support you, offer tips, and make sure your first (or next) ride is as safe and exciting as possible. Join me, and together we‚Äôll discover the true spirit of enduro!

yuriy.name: Yura
yuriy.description: For me, enduro is about the mountains, freedom, and the journey to yourself. I don‚Äôt just ride ‚Äì I live it. I love guiding guests through mountain trails, discovering new routes, and sharing the energy of adventure. Tourism and thrill are my element.

sasha.name: Sasha
sasha.description: I live for motorcycles and the mountains. Every ride is a chance to share what I love: freedom, technique, and emotion. I carefully listen to each rider‚Äôs needs and always generously share tips to make your ride not just safe, but truly unforgettable.

dmytro.name: Dmytro Demianenko
dmytro.text: ‚ùù A case when your expectations are exceeded big time. One full day turned into a 10+ hour journey through varied trails, giving a rich and often surprising feel of the mountains on an enduro. Want extreme? You‚Äôll get it, and stunning views will be the cherry on top. The bike was fresh and clean, full gear too. We got coffee and tea, and the care from the team was obvious even during planning. This isn‚Äôt just a rental ‚Äî it‚Äôs a real experience, made with love for bikes, mountains and people. Highly recommend! Will come back for sure! ‚ùû

artem.name: Artem Serdtsev
artem.text: ‚ùù Totally recommend! Huge choice of bikes for your body size and skill. Yurii is very kind and pro ‚Äî helped me pick a perfect bike and clean gear. The route was super scenic, changing based on my skills! Pure emotions! After the ride ‚Äî hot shower and a gift: branded socks and a coffee ü•∞ On the way, Yurii also gave us water. 2 hours of pure joy! My recommendation... ‚ùû

denys.name: Denys Nahornyi
denys.text: ‚ùù We booked enduro for the whole family. Very professional service. The bikes and gear were all fresh and smelled great. There‚Äôs a changing room and shower, everything for comfort. Trails vary by your skills. We loved it. Next time ‚Äî quads! Thank you for the great emotions. Everyone loved it a lot!!!!!!!! ‚ùû

artemT.name: Artem Taranenko
artemT.text: ‚ùù Got so much joy and that good kind of tired after 3 hours riding in the hills. The 300cc bike was in perfect shape, and the gear was fresh and comfy. Our guide Vasyl not only led the way but taught me new things. Guys, thanks for the great approach. Wish you success and hope to ride again! ‚ùû

alexander.name: Alexander Zas
alexander.text: ‚ùù We booked today and rode across many ridges. Tons of joy, amazing views and memories. I recommend this place. Bikes are top, gear is clean and disinfected. So flexible ‚Äî the guide even took my 14-year-old daughter as a passenger. Great service and hygiene ‚Äî 5+ ‚ùû
